summary: This correspondence is our third update on 2020 Census activities and operations. It includes information from our ongoing work on challenges raised by COVID-19 . Delays and changes to operations as a result of COVID-19 may threaten the accuracy, timeliness, and cost effectiveness of the count. As operations restart, the Census Bureau will need to consider multiple ways to counter these challenges. For example, following...
title: 2020 Census: COVID-19 Presents Delays and Risks to Census Count
